info.title: Schema of PolicyInsights events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the PolicyInsights events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

PolicyInsightsPolicyStateChangedEventDat.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.PolicyInsights.PolicyStateChanged event.

timestamp.description: The time that the resource was scanned by Azure Policy in the Universal ISO 8601 DateTime format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffffZ.

policyAssignmentId.description: The resource ID of the policy assignment.

policyDefinitionId.description: The resource ID of the policy definition.

policyDefinitionReferenceId.description: The reference ID for the policy definition inside the initiative definition, if the policy assignment is for an initiative. May be empty.

complianceState.description: The compliance state of the resource with respect to the policy assignment.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the resource.

complianceReasonCode.description: The compliance reason code. May be empty.
